item.title: Math
item.description: Starred by 25+ users, GitHub Repo: LeetCode Pattern 500 offers: 500 solutions for LeetCode problems in Python and Java 17 notes on essential concepts related to data structures and algorithms 130 patterns for solving LeetCode problems math intro carry in addition, carry is a number that moves to the next column when adding two nums and their column sum is too big for that digit (should consider we are using which base) division using division help us constructing a num without converting it to a string catalan number Cn = C(2n, n) / (n+1) or (2n)!
